definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: These eave tiles are carved with many animal pictures.
sentences.chinese: 這些瓦當上都刻有各種各樣的動物圖案。

sentences.english: Like other forms of art, the art of tile ends is also a reflection of the social and economic structures.
sentences.chinese: 瓦當和其他藝術一樣，也是一定社會經濟形態的反映。

sentences.english: The tile ends in Shaanxi Province boasts deep traditional Chinese philosophy and traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 陝西瓦當深含着中國傳統文化和哲學思想。

sentences.english: Eaves Tiles have a strong artistic styles of different times.
sentences.chinese: 瓦當有着強烈的不同時代的藝術風格。

definition: variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
item made from woven silk or rayon
Gu Kaizhi or Ku K'aichih (346-407), famous painter of Eastern Jin dynasty, one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家
